## Handwriter Application {.unnumbered}


### Description

Lauch a 'shiny' application for 'handwriter'.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>handwriterApp(...)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="...">...</code></td>
<td>
Optional arguments passed to shiny::shinyApp
</td></tr>
</table>


### Value

No return value, called to launch 'shiny' app

A Shiny app



### Examples
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library(handwriterApp)

handwriterApp()




```
